question: Aqueous solution of raw sugar when passed over beds of animal charcoal, it becomes colourless. Pick the correct set of terminologies that can be used for the above example.
| | Adsorbent | Adsorbate | Process |
| (A) | Animal Charcoal | Colouring Substance | Adsorption |
| (B) | Colouring Substance | Animal Charcoal | Adsorption |
| (C) | Solution of Sugar | Animal Charcoal | Sorption |
| (D) | Animal Charcoal | Solution of Sugar | Absorption |
